vsParam:
OK, so...
Let's show Wistyria around the Academy today!

Hehe, it'll be hard to live here
if you're not familiar with the Academy... Huh?

Hey, [px]!
Check this out! What is it?!

It's covered by characters!
Let me see, the "Pyroxene of Wisdom"?

Ah, it's inscription. The "Pyroxene of Wisdom"
is the peak of famous alchemy.

Come on, she can't understand it even you explain it.
We'll tell you about it later step by step.

Awesome~
I'm looking forward to it, so excited!

Let's start from the Academy facilities.
First, the library...

I think we've shown you all of them.
Any questions?

Yes! What is alchemy?
It's used to make the "Pyroxene of Wisdom"?

Hehe, the "Pyroxene of Wisdom" is the peak of alchemy,
but it's not what alchemy is for. As for alchemy...
It's a skill to make other items with ingredients.
It equals to stirring the pot!

Oh... To make other items with ingredients!?
Impressive, awesome!

Oh...
I need to learn how to stir the pot!

Hey, don't talk nonsense! Simply put, it's a skill
to make other items with ingredients.

To make other items with ingredients!?
Impressive, awesome!

[px]!
I'd like to see how alchemy works!

No, I don't think [px] could make it now...
We can show you how alchemy works though.

Exactly, show her.
We have nothing to lose... except for some ingredients.

Hehe, now let's watch [px] show us
how alchemy works.

Yay, wonderful! [px]!
Show us! Show us! Hurry up! Hurry!
